tha-ap265:0.3_0: held half a rich family, affluent, and wealthy seniors.
tha-ap265:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap265:2.4_0: I’ve been born in the awakening.
tha-ap265:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap265:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nandiya.
tha-ap265:6.1_0: and a third, acting with senior monks.
